part.title: Integration
part.p: This worksheet discusses material from section 1.1 of your book. We begin with some friendly review.

chapter.title: Riemann Sums
chapter.p: Recall that the definite integral of f on the closed interval [a,b] is \int_a^b f(x)\; dx = \lim_{n \to \infty} \sum_{i=1}^n f(x_i) \Delta x where \Delta x = \frac{b-a}{n} and x_i = a + i \Delta x for i = 1, \dots, n. This definite integral represents the area under the curve f from a to b.
